title: Portable Pedal-Powered Generator
lead: A mechanically driven power generation system designed to convert human pedaling into usable electrical energy for everyday devices.
summary: Designed and manufactured a portable mechanical generator capable of producing usable DC power for phone charging and lighting.

title: Accessible Cup Holder Bracket
lead: An accessibility-focused mechanical component designed for real-world use, emphasizing manufacturability, strength, and cost efficiency.
summary: Designed, analyzed, and manufactured a sheet-metal steel cup holder bracket for wheelchair and crutch users.
bullets: Cost and time studies for scaling

report.title: Accessible Cup Holder Bracket – Final Report
